articles.title: Delhi Under A Thick Haze Of Dust, Pollution At "Severe" Level
articles.description: As a thick blanket of haze and dust enveloped Delhi and parts of the National Capital Region (NCR), the air quality nosedived to the "severe" level. People have been advised to stay at home as the dusty conditions are likely to prevail for the next few days. …

articles.title: Do not have sex with foreign men during Fifa World Cup 2018: Russian lawmaker warns

articles.author: FE Online
articles.title: Happy Eid 2018: Eid Mubarak, Wishes, Quotes, Photos, Greetings, Whatsapp & Facebook Status
articles.description: Happy Eid 2018: Festivities are around the corner and it is that time of the year when people gear up to celebrate Eid again.

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Two Muslim men, suspected of cattle theft, lynched in Jharkhand
articles.description: Four persons, including Murmu (the accused of lynching), have been arrested in this connection so far

articles.title: Market Live: Nifty breaks 10800, Sensex falls 200 pts; Infosys trades ex-dividend
articles.description: Asian shares traded lower after Fed raises rates and signals more hikes ahead.

articles.author: NDTVSports.com
articles.title: India vs Afghanistan, Live Score One-Off Test Day 1: India Openers Off To Cautious Start vs Afghanistan
articles.description: No Karun Nair, Kuldeep Yadav, Shardul Thakur or Navdeep Saini in the playing XI for India against Afghanistan.

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: 1 Army personnel, 2 militants killed in ongoing operation in Bandipora
articles.description: The army personnel sustained serious bullet wounds during the operation. Later, he was immediately evacuated to a military hospital. However, he succumbed to his injuries.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Lights, camera, summit: Critics pan White House Kim Jong Un film
articles.description: It was played on big screens ahead of his news conference, Korean version first. "No-one really knew what was going on," said one photographer in the room. "It felt like a propaganda film by the Koreans."

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: BharatNet: Airtel partners with telecom department to boost rural broadband penetration
articles.description: Under the partnership, Airtel has set up three such centres in three villages in the Ghazipur, Gorakhpur and Varanasi districts of Uttar Pradesh, India's no. 1 telco said in a statement.

articles.title: Madras HC to deliver verdict today on petitions challenging disqualification of 18 AIADMK MLAs in TTV Dhinakaran camp
articles.description: The Madras High Court is expected to deliver its verdict on petitions challenging the disqualification of 18 AIADMK MLAs owing allegiance to sidelined party leader TTV Dhinakaran

articles.title: Aircel-Maxis case: Company under probe paid for Karti Chidambaram watches, paintings, ED to Delhi court

articles.author: Khushboo Narayan
articles.title: Nirav Modi used revoked passport four times to travel: Interpol
articles.description: In a June 5 letter to Indian agencies, Interpol said Nirav Modi travelled between United States, United Kingdom and Hong Kong on his Indian passport between March 15 and March 31.

articles.title: PM Like Vajpayee Would've Taken Steps To Wnd Impasse In Delhi: Yashwant Sinha
articles.description: Former Union minister Yashwant Sinha on Wednesday said a prime minister like Atal Bihari Vajpayee would have held talks with Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal to end the ongoing impasse between the AAP government and the bureaucracy.

articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: Rahul Gandhi: Grand alliance against BJP a public sentiment
articles.description: “It is the sentiment of the people and not just political parties that are opposed to the BJP to have a mahagatbandhan that can take on the Prime Minister, the BJP and the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh,” Rahul said in Mumbai.

articles.author: Rhea Mistry
articles.title: Two firemen suffocate in Prabhadevi blaze
articles.description: Deepika Padukone lives on 26th floor of Beau Monde towers; Sena corporator questions safety of buildings with glass facade

articles.title: How IPS Officers Reacted To PM Modi Tagging Them In Fitness Challenge
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday morning nominated Indian Police Service or IPS officers, especially those above 40, to take up the fitness challenge which was started by Union Minister Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore.

articles.title: Government failed to protect borders, is weak and cowardly, Congress slams Modi over BSF firing
articles.description: Congress leader Pramod Tiwari also accused the prime minister of insulting the martyrdom of the four BSF personnel by releasing his 'fitness video' on the day of the incident.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Bhaiyyu Maharaj suicide: Won't conclude anything in haste, says police
articles.description: The 50-year-old Maharaj, whose original name is Uday Singh Deshmukh, allegedly committed suicide by shooting himself at his house here yesterday, police said.

articles.author: Gregg Re
articles.title: There's a 'special place in hell' for Trudeau after his G7 'stunt,' top WH Trade Adviser Peter Navarro says
articles.description: President Trump should be careful not to become a propaganda tool duing his historic meeting with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un in Singapore, Former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson said on "Fox News Sunday."

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Expedite setting of Patanjali mega food park: Union food minister tells Yogi government
articles.description: I have written to the Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister to sort out all the issues and expedite the process for setting up of this proposed food park, said Harsimrat Kaur Badal.
